LanguageData.Bullet_HammerburstMKII.label: hammerburst bullet

LanguageData.Bullet_Trishot.label: trishot bullet
LanguageData.Gun_BoltokPistol.label: Boltok Pistol
LanguageData.Gun_BoltokPistol.description: A high caliber revolver manufactured by the Locust Horde. It is slow to fire and relatively innacurate, but deals a devastating ammount of damage.
LanguageData.Gun_BoltokPistol.tools.grip.label: grip
LanguageData.Gun_BoltokPistol.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_BoltokPistol.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Boltok Pistol
LanguageData.Gun_Boomshot.label: Boomshot
LanguageData.Gun_Boomshot.description: The Boomshot is a pump-action grenade launcher loaded via a large drum magazine. It fires a HE shell that excels at clearing out enemies behind cover. It can also be used as a semi-long range artillery weapon.
LanguageData.Gun_Boomshot.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_Boomshot.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Boomshot
LanguageData.Gun_Breechshot.label: Breechshot
LanguageData.Gun_Breechshot.description: The Breechshot is a locust manufactured high caliber, straight pull rifle designed for hunting Brumaks. The Breechshots were orginally Markzas that the locust mdified heavily in order to suit their own needs.
LanguageData.Gun_Breechshot.tools.bayonet.label: bayonet
LanguageData.Gun_Breechshot.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Breechshot
LanguageData.Gun_Buzzkill.label: Buzzkill
LanguageData.Gun_Buzzkill.description: The Buzzkill is a COG manufactured mining tool that has been modified to fire circular saw blades.
LanguageData.Gun_Buzzkill.tools.saw.label: saw
LanguageData.Gun_Buzzkill.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Buzzkill
LanguageData.Gun_Dropshot.label: Dropshot
LanguageData.Gun_Dropshot.description: The Dropshot is a COG mining tool that fires an aerial drill bit which hovers in a straight line as long as the trigger is pressed. Once the trigger is released the drill bit will slam downwards, drilling through everything in its path and exploding shortly after. The Dropshot excels at flushing enemies out of cover, as it can fire over walls and barricades.
LanguageData.Gun_Dropshot.tools.drill.label: drill
LanguageData.Gun_Dropshot.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Dropshot
LanguageData.Gun_Enforcer.label: Enforcer
LanguageData.Gun_Enforcer.description: The Enforcer is a compact SMG commonly used by the Sheperd defense bots. High rate of fire and decent damage, but low range.
LanguageData.Gun_Enforcer.tools.grip.label: grip
LanguageData.Gun_Enforcer.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_Enforcer.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Enforcer
LanguageData.Gun_GnasherShotgun.label: Gnasher Shotgun
LanguageData.Gun_GnasherShotgun.description: The Gnasher is a lever action Shotgun utilized by the COGs' soldiers. The Gnasher is incredibly lethal at close ranges, however its usefulness falls off greatly at a distance. Come equipped with a bayonet for melee engagements.
LanguageData.Gun_GnasherShotgun.tools.bayonet.label: bayonet
LanguageData.Gun_GnasherShotgun.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_HammerburstMKI.label: Hammerburst MKI
LanguageData.Gun_HammerburstMKI.description: The Hammerburst assault rifle is the standard issue weapon for the Locust Horde. It fires in six-round bursts. Good range, low power, high rate of fire.
LanguageData.Gun_HammerburstMKI.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_HammerburstMKI.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_HammerburstMKII.label: Hammerburst MKII
LanguageData.Gun_HammerburstMKII.description: The Hammerburst MkII is the result of many upgrades and improvements to its previous version. It became the standard issue weapon of the locust horde shortly after the lightmass bombing.
LanguageData.Gun_HammerburstMKII.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_HammerburstMKII.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_LancerRifle.label: Lancer Assault Rifle
LanguageData.Gun_LancerRifle.description: The Lancer assault rifle is the standard issue weapon for the COGs' soldiers. It is effective at almost all ranges, has good firepower, and has a chainsaw bayonet that can quickly rip through enemies at close range.
LanguageData.Gun_LancerRifle.tools.chainsaw.label: chainsaw
LanguageData.Gun_LancerRifle.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_LancerRifle.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Lancer Assault Rifle
LanguageData.Gun_Longshot.label: Longshot
LanguageData.Gun_Longshot.description: The Longshot sniper rifle is a high caliber bolt action rifle manufactured by the COG during the Pendulum wars. Extreme accuracy, range, and damage. I LOVE THAT POP!
LanguageData.Gun_Longshot.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_Longshot.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_Longshot.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Longshot
LanguageData.Gun_RetroLancer.label: Retro Lancer
LanguageData.Gun_RetroLancer.description: The Lancer MK1 (aka the Retro Lancer) was predecessor to the Lancer MK2 Assault Rifle. It saw use in the pendulum wars and in the early stages of the Locust war, but soon had to be replaced do to its inferiority to Locust weaponry at the time. These things can stop a truck if the recoil dosent dislocate your shoulder first.
LanguageData.Gun_RetroLancer.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_RetroLancer.tools.bayonet.label: bayonet
LanguageData.Gun_RetroLancer.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Retro Lancer
LanguageData.Gun_SnubPistol.label: Snub Pistol
LanguageData.Gun_SnubPistol.description: Standard issues sidearm for COG soldiers. Low firepower and range, but is very quick to fire, making it useful in avariety of situations.
LanguageData.Gun_SnubPistol.tools.grip.label: grip
LanguageData.Gun_SnubPistol.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_SnubPistol.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Snub Pistol
LanguageData.Gun_Trishot.label: Trishot
LanguageData.Gun_Trishot.description: The Tri-Shot is a heavy weapon wielded by COG defense bots. Its shots are incredibly damaging, however it is prone to overheating, meaning it will need to be fired in shorter bursts.
LanguageData.Gun_Trishot.tools.barrels.label: barrels
LanguageData.Gun_Trishot.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Trishot
